To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private RickshawMan _rickshawman;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_rickshawman = RickshawMan(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_rickshawman.IsReady)
{
    var period = _rickshawman.Period.Value;
    var current = _rickshawman.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.rickshawman = self.RickshawMan(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.rickshawman.IsReady:
    period = self.rickshawman.Period.Value
    current = self.rickshawman.Current.Value
